com.sap.dirigible.ide.workspace

Class RemoteResourcesPlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sap.dirigible.ide.workspace.RemoteResourcesPlugin

  • public class RemoteResourcesPlugin
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is similar to the org.eclipse.core.resources.ResourcesPlugin class. It mimics most of the methods.

    What differs this class from the original is that it provides a unique workspace for each of the users. This is required because of the milti-user architecture of RAP.

    • Method Detail

      • getWorkspace

        public static IWorkspace getWorkspace()
        Returns the workspace corresponding to this user session.

        Once obtained, the IWorkspace instance can be used to create projects, directories, files, etc.

        Node:Currently, the returned implementation will not support most of the methods and will throw an UnsupportedOperationException exception when that is the case.

        Returns:
        an IWorkspace instance.
        See Also:
        UnsupportedOperationException, IWorkspace

      • getUserName

        public static java.lang.String getUserName()

      • getWorkspace

        public static IWorkspace getWorkspace(java.lang.String user)
        Returns a Workspace instance for the specified user name.

        Node:Currently, the returned implementation will not support most of the methods and will throw an UnsupportedOperationException exception when that is the case.

        Parameters:
        user - the user for which a workspace must be returned.
        Returns:
        a Workspace instance.
        See Also:
        UnsupportedOperationException, IWorkspace

      • getSharedWorkspace

        public static IWorkspace getSharedWorkspace()
        Always returns the shared workspace corresponding to the GUEST user.

        Once obtained, the IWorkspace instance can be used to create projects, directories, files, etc.

        Node:Currently, the returned implementation will not support most of the methods and will throw an UnsupportedOperationException exception when that is the case.

        Returns:
        an IWorkspace instance.
        See Also:
        UnsupportedOperationException, IWorkspace
